ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] First time player
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh please don t make me take back anything I said. Level 26 in 2 weeks?  I have questions there...... Did your business go under????lol ...
ygData.messageBody:
Oh please don't make me take back anything I said.
Level 26 in 2 weeks? I have questions there......

Did your business go under????lol


--- Philip Harrelson <pharr@...> wrote:
>
> OK OK, I was playing "casually" for a bulk of the
> time. New
> business..personal BS...blah blah blah. But
> generally I was working on
> Fletching and exploring as many places as I could.
> But consider this.
> After all of that time exploring and learning about
> the game I became able
> to start a new character and level him to 26 in
> about two weeks of playing.
> Not bad me thinks. Playing casually makes it hard
> to gain levels. Spend
> too much time travelling and looking for groups etc.
>
>
> Playing full time now though! YAY!
>
> Phil
>
>
